bibl.title: Egyptian Papyri and 'Divinity' of the Roman Emperor.

The Impact of Imperial Rome on Religions, Ritual and Religious Life in the Roman Empire. Proceedings of the Fifth Workshop of the International Network Impact of Empire (Roman Empire, 200 B.C. - A.D. 476)

Lukas DE BLOIS, Peter FUNKE and Johannes HAHN (Edd.), The Impact of Imperial Rome on Religions, Ritual and Religious Life in the Roman Empire.
